title: ADHD-Friendly Movement Routine
description: A movement and exercise routine designed specifically for ADHD brains. Uses short, varied, dopamine-driven activities that work with ADHD energy patterns, sensory needs, and motivation systems to make movement sustainable and enjoyable.

setupSteps.question: What's your biggest movement challenge? (getting started, staying consistent, finding time, or all of the above)
What time of day do you have the most physical energy?
What type of movement do you enjoy most? (dancing, walking, stretching, jumping, yoga, or something else)
How many minutes can you realistically dedicate to movement each day? (Start small - 5-15 minutes is perfect!)
What music or audio helps you feel energized? (specific genre, artist, podcast, or silence)
